entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON

CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN

PARTLY CLOUDY

COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 30

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
